00013 #ifndef __L4UTIL__INCLUDE__ARCH_ARM__ATOMIC_ARCH_H__
00014 #define __L4UTIL__INCLUDE__ARCH_ARM__ATOMIC_ARCH_H__
00015 
00016 #ifdef __GNUC__
00017 
00018 #include <l4/sys/atomic.h>
00019 
00020 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00021 
00022 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG32
00023 L4_INLINE int
00024 l4util_cmpxchg32(volatile l4_uint32_t * dest,
00025                  l4_uint32_t cmp_val, l4_uint32_t new_val)
00026 {
00027   return l4_atomic_cmpxchg((volatile long int *)dest, cmp_val, new_val);
00028 }
00029 
00030 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG
00031 L4_INLINE int
00032 l4util_cmpxchg(volatile l4_umword_t * dest,
00033                l4_umword_t cmp_val, l4_umword_t new_val)
00034 {
00035   return l4_atomic_cmpxchg((volatile long int *)dest, cmp_val, new_val);
00036 }
00037 
00038 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG32
00039 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00040 l4util_xchg32(volatile l4_uint32_t *dest, l4_uint32_t new_val)
00041 {
00042   return l4_atomic_xchg((volatile long int *)dest, new_val);
00043 }
00044 
00045 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG
00046 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00047 l4util_xchg(volatile l4_umword_t *dest, l4_umword_t new_val)
00048 {
00049   return l4_atomic_xchg((volatile long int *)dest, new_val);
00050 }
00051 
00052 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD
00053 L4_INLINE void
00054 l4util_atomic_add(volatile long *dest, long val)
00055 {
00056   l4_atomic_add(dest, val);
00057 }
00058 
00059 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC
00060 L4_INLINE void
00061 l4util_atomic_inc(volatile long *dest)
00062 {
00063   l4_atomic_add(dest, 1);
00064 }
00065 
00066 L4_INLINE void
00067 l4util_inc32(volatile l4_uint32_t *dest)
00068 {
00069   l4_atomic_add((volatile long int *)dest, 1);
00070 }
00071 
00072 L4_INLINE void
00073 l4util_dec32(volatile l4_uint32_t *dest)
00074 {
00075   l4_atomic_add((volatile long int *)dest, -1);
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00080 l4util_inc32_res(volatile l4_uint32_t *dest)
00081 {
00082   return l4_atomic_add((volatile long int *)dest, 1);
00083 }
00084 
00085 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00086 l4util_dec32_res(volatile l4_uint32_t *dest)
00087 {
00088   return l4_atomic_add((volatile long int *)dest, -1);
00089 }
00090 
00091 EXTERN_C_END
00092 
00093 #endif //__GNUC__
00094 
00095 #endif /* ! __L4UTIL__INCLUDE__ARCH_ARM__ATOMIC_ARCH_H__ */
